thread.title: Djibril Cisse Is in Custody for the Alleged Blackmail of Mathieu Valbuena over a Sex Tape
thread.title_full: Djibril Cisse Is in Custody for the Alleged Blackmail of Mathieu Valbuena over a Sex Tape | Complex UK

author: Corey Pellatt
title: Djibril Cisse Is in Custody for the Alleged Blackmail of Mathieu Valbuena over a Sex Tape
text:
In a game that's full with weird and wonderful personalities, ex-Liverpool striker Djibril Cisse still manages to stand out and this latest story is almost too strange for words.
Thr 34-year-old striker – who most recently played with Bastia in Ligue 1 – is in custody in France over his involvement in an alleged blackmail plot against fellow France international, Mathieu Valbuena .
According to French newspaper Le Figaro, Cisse is one of four men to have been arrested in connection with the plot that reportedly relates to bribery and a sex tape.
Djibril Cisse is expected to be "ruled out of the case" after questioning. It seems like Cisse's arrest has purely been precautionary and after co-operating with the investigation, he's "expected to be ruled out of the case soon".
Never a dull moment in the life of Djibril.
[via BBC Sport ]
